name: Vicious Claw
effectText: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, return this card to the hand instead, then destroy 1 monster, except the one that battled the equipped monster, and if you do, inflict 600 damage to your opponent. Then, Special Summon 1 "Evil Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 7/ATK 2500/DEF 2500) to your opponent's field. During the turn this card is returned to your hand, you cannot use "Vicious Claw" from your hand.
